summary: This is a brief email forwarding memos related to the Epstein case, noting that one memo from an unnamed individual was not signed and would be signed upon her return. The document shows internal communication regarding case documentation.
keyFacts: An email dated July 31, 2019, forwards memos related to the Epstein case.
The email notes that a memo from an unnamed individual (referred to as 'Ms.') was not signed.
The sender states an intention to have the memo signed when the individual returns.
The document includes attachments named 'TEXT.htm', '2019_Memo.pdf', and 'lst_mcc_memo-_Epstien.docx'.
All personal names in the document are redacted or omitted, indicated by blank spaces in the 'From', 'To', and 'Subject' fields and references to unnamed individuals.
